Updated Project Template - The framework versions of Nancy project templates are set to 4.6.1
Added support for dynamic templates

Added SortOrder and set it to 1000 for all ItemTemplates that didn't already have a SortOrder element
Added xUnit test project

Chrome templates: Copy files only when 'Copy to Output Directory' is set
Chrome templates: Copy files from scripts folder, not only app
Chrome templates: Added unpacked folder for the Chrome extensions to make debugging easier
